description: If you say "Alexa play 80's Movie Trivia" you will be presented with 5 questions each with a choice of 5 answers.  Alexa with read your choices of answers along with a corresponding number.  Answer using the number that is associated with the correct answer.  At the end of the 5 questions Alexa will tell you how many you answered correctly.
name: 80's Movie Trivia
shortDescription: If you say "Alexa play 80's Movie Trivia" you will be presented with 5 questions, each with a choice of 5 answers.  Answer using the corresponding number.
